Davenport.Hillside (Davenport, Iowa): Hillside, also known as the Charles Schuler House, is a mansion overlooking the Mississippi River on the eastside of Davenport, Iowa, United States. It has been individually listed on the National Register of Historic Places since 1982 and the Davenport Register of Historic Properties since 1992. It is also a contributing property in the Prospect Park Historic District.
